meta.article_title: How to Win the Choice at the Start of a Match

win-choice-start-match_snake_case.probleme: Win the choice at the start of a match

debutant.description: Watch opponent's other matches and see which hand they typically choose.
Put ball in your left hand against a righty player, and vice versa.
Slightly flex muscles of the hand not holding the ball and hold that hand a little lower.

exercices_complementaires.description: Watch opponent's other matches and see which hand they typically choose. Put ball in your left hand against a righty player, and vice versa. Slightly flex muscles of the hand not holding the ball and hold that hand a little lower.

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Experienced players who cross you up, especially on slight flexing in the arm holding the ball.
